title: Initial properties of the complex numbers

blocks.name: mul31
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mul31(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cmul, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), co(co(c2, cmul, c1), cmul, c0), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mulcom(c1, c2)
  mulass(c0, c1, c2)
  mulcomd(co(c2, cmul, c1), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c2, c1)
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
}

blocks.name: mul4
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 factors. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm mul4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c3)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantrr(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3)))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  mul32(c0, c1, c2)
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c1)
  3expb(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, c2), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))))
  mulass(co(c0, cmul, c1), c2, c3)
  an4s(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c3))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc))
  mulcl(c0, c2)
  3expb(wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, c1), cmul, c3), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c3))))
  mulass(co(c0, cmul, c2), c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: mul4r
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 factors: swap the right factors in the factors of a product of two products. (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm mul4r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c1)), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c3, cmul, c2)))
  mulcom(c2, c3)
  ancom2s(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(c3, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  mul4(c0, c1, c3, c2)
  oveq2d(co(c0, cmul, c3), cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  mulcomd(c1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
}

blocks.name: muladd11
blocks.content: A simple product of sums expansion. (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm muladd11(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, nat1), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, nat1), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1))), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cc))
  mp3an2(wcel(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, nat1), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  adddi(co(nat1, caddc, c0), nat1, c1)
  oveq12d(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, nat1), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1), co(nat1, caddc, c0), co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, nat1), co(nat1, caddc, c0)))
  mulid1d(co(nat1, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  addcl(nat1, c0)
  eqtrd(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(co(nat1, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, c1), co(co(nat1, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  adddir(nat1, c0, c1)
  oveq1d(co(nat1, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, c1), c1))
  mulid2(c1)
}

blocks.name: readdcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for addition over the reals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm readdcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wceq(co(c2, caddc, c0), co(c2, caddc, c1)), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c0), co(c2, caddc, c1)), wceq(c0, c1), wa(wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0))), wa(wn(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wn(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c0)))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wn(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wn(wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c0))))
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c0), clt, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
  ltadd2(c0, c1, c2)
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c0)))
  ltadd2d(c1, c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  lttri3d(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  lttri3d(co(c2, caddc, c0), co(c2, caddc, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  readdcld(c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  readdcld(c2, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
}

blocks.name: 00id
blocks.content: ` 0 ` is its own additive identity. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm 00id() {
  |- wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0)
} = {
  mp2b(wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0), wcel(nat0, cr), wrex(hs0, cr, wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  ax-rnegex(hs0, nat0)
  rexlimiva(hs0, cr, wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0))
  pm2.61ine(cv(hs0), nat0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0)))
  adantld(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(nat0, caddc, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, nat0, caddc)
  expcom(wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0))
  rexlimddv(hs1, cr, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))
  adantlr(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wrex(hs1, cr, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1)))
  ax-rrecex(hs1, cv(hs0))
  eqtr3d(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0, nat0, wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), nat0, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat0), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  recnd(cv(hs1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  mp3an3(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat0), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cc))
  mulass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), nat0)
  ad2antll(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat0), nat0))
  syl6eq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, nat0), nat0, co(nat1, cmul, nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))
  oveq1(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1, cmul, nat0)
  mulid2i(nat0)
  mpbid(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0), nat0), wceq(co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0)), co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0)))
  eqtr2d(co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0)), co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0), co(co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0))), caddc, nat0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, nat0, co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  eqtr3d(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0))), co(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0), nat0, wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  simpllr(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1)))
  mp3an2i(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))), wceq(co(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), co(co(nat0, cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0)))), wcel(nat0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs1), cmul, nat0), cc))
  recnd(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), nat1))))

thm mul02lem2(class c0) {

  3eqtr3g(co(nat0, caddc, nat1), co(nat0, caddc, nat0), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(co(nat0, cmul, c0), nat0)))
  oveq2d(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(co(nat0, cmul, c0), nat0)))
  eqcomd(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(co(nat0, cmul, c0), nat0)))
  mpan2(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(co(nat0, cmul, c0), nat0)), wceq(nat1, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  mul02lem1(c0, nat1)
  eqtr3i(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, co(nat1, caddc, nat1)), co(nat0, caddc, nat1), co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1))
  addassi(co(ci, cmul, ci), nat1, nat1)
  mulcli(ci, ci)
  ax-icn()

  oveq1i(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), caddc, nat1, nat0)

blocks.name: cnegex2
blocks.content: Existence of a left inverse for addition. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnegex2(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, c0), nat0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cc), wrex(s0, cc, wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, c0), nat0)), wcel(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), cc), wceq(co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0), nat0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, ci), cc))
  mulcl(co(ci, cmul, ci), c0)
  eqtr3d(co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0), nat0, co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq2d(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0), c0, wcel(c0, cc))
  mulid2(c0)
  3eqtr3a(co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0)), nat0, co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), co(nat0, cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq1i(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), cmul, c0, nat0)
  ax-i2m1()
  mp3an12(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cmul, c0))), wcel(co(ci, cmul, ci), cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  mulcli(ci, ci)
  ax-icn()
  ax-1cn()
  adddir(co(ci, cmul, ci), nat1, c0)
  mul02(c0)
  rspcev(s0, co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), cc, wceq(co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0), nat0), wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, c0), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), caddc, c0), nat0, co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0), nat0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0), caddc, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(ci, cmul, ci), cmul, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, ci, cmul, ci)
  diff.ci.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: addid2
blocks.content: ` 0 ` is a left identity for addition. This used to be one of our complex number axioms, until it was discovered that it was dependent on the others. Based on ideas by Eric Schmidt. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm addid2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0))
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  cnegex(hs0, c0)
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0), wrex(hs1, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wrex(hs1, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)))
  cnegex(hs1, cv(hs0))
  rexlimdv(hs1, cc, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0))
  expd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0))
  3eqtr3rd(co(nat0, caddc, c0), c0, co(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)), wceq(co(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs1)))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(co(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, caddc, co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs1)))))

  0cn()
  addass(nat0, nat0, cv(hs1))
  syl5eq(co(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), caddc, cv(hs1)), c0, co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))))
  oveq1i(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), caddc, cv(hs1), nat0)
  00id()
  oveq2d(nat0, caddc, co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs1)), c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))))

  addassd(c0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)))
  simp2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)))
  simp3l(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), caddc, cv(hs1), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))))

  simp3r(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c0, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), nat0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat0), c0))

blocks.name: addcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for addition. Theorem I.1 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm addcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wrex(hs0, cc, wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0)))
  cnegex2(hs0, c0)
  impbid1(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl5ib(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c2))))
  oveq2(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2), cv(hs0), caddc)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c2)), c1, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), c1, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(nat0, caddc, c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), caddc, c1, nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  addassd(cv(hs0), c0, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c1), c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0)))
  addid2(c1)
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c2)), c2, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), caddc, c2), co(nat0, caddc, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), caddc, c2, nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))
  addassd(cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0)))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0))), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, c2), c2), wcel(c2, cc))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c0), nat0)))
  addid2(c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, caddc)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, caddc, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: addcan2
blocks.content: Cancellation law for addition. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm addcan2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2)), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2)), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wrex(hs0, cc, wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  cnegex(hs0, c2)
  impbid1(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2)), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl5ib(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2)), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0))))
  oveq1(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(co(c1, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0)), c0, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0)), c0, co(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0))), co(c0, caddc, nat0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  addassd(c0, c2, cv(hs0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  oveq2d(c0, caddc, co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat0), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  addid1(c0)
  3eqtrd(co(co(c1, caddc, c2), caddc, cv(hs0)), c1, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0))), co(c1, caddc, nat0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  addassd(c1, c2, cv(hs0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wceq(co(c1, caddc, nat0), c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(c2, caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0)))
  addid1(c1)
  oveq1(c0, c1, caddc, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)))
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c2), co(c1, caddc, c2)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: addcom
blocks.content: Addition commutes. This used to be one of our complex number axioms, until it was found to be dependent on the others. Based on ideas by Eric Schmidt. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm addcom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0))))
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0)), co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1)))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adddid(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(nat1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  1cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  1p1times(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  oveqan12d(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c0), co(c1, caddc, c1), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  1p1times(c0)
  1p1times(c1)
  addassd(co(c0, caddc, c0), c1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addassd(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcld(co(c0, caddc, c0), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(c0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcan2(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), c1)
  addassd(c0, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addassd(c0, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcan(c0, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0))
}

blocks.origin:
thm addcomd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0))))
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0)), co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1)))
  3eqtr4d(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), w0)
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c1)), w0)
  adddid(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), c0, c1, w0)
  addcld(nat1, nat1, w0)
  1cnd(w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc))
  1p1times(co(c0, caddc, c1))
  oveq12d(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c1), co(c0, caddc, c0), co(c1, caddc, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), co(c0, caddc, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  1p1times(c0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), cmul, c1), co(c1, caddc, c1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  1p1times(c1)
  addassd(co(c0, caddc, c0), c1, c1, w0)
  addassd(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, c1, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), caddc, c1), co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), caddc, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0))), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcld(co(c0, caddc, c0), c1, w0)
  addcld(c0, c0, w0)
  addcld(co(c0, caddc, c1), c0, w0)
  addcan2(co(co(c0, caddc, c0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, c0), c1)
  addassd(c0, c0, c1, w0)
  addassd(c0, c1, c0, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c0))), wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cc), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c0), cc))
  addcld(c0, c1, w0)
  addcld(c1, c0, w0)
  addcan(c0, co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c0))
}

blocks.origin:
thm muladd11r(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cmul, co(nat1, caddc, c1)), co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq12d(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(nat1, caddc, c0), co(nat1, caddc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcomd(c0, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcomd(c1, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  muladd11(c0, c1)
  3eqtrd(co(co(nat1, caddc, c0), caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), co(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), caddc, nat1), co(nat1, caddc, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)))), co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), caddc, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addassd(nat1, c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcomd(nat1, co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  1cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcld(c1, co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), caddc, nat1, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  eqtr3d(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c0, caddc, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addassd(c0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  addcomd(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  addcl(c0, c1)
  mulcl(c0, c1)
}
